description:
I wasn't actually ever going to release this video. Adam for sure gets plenty of work on my site, and Bralin has branched out..well..everywhere. They both had been after me for them to do a scene together after partying together at the Vegas convention. They needed the money, and I thought I would save this video as bonus material for a DVD.
Instead, it's here part of Member Appreciation week!
I had a bunch of new toys, including this wacky vibro thing you wrap around your dick (Adam loved this and took it home!) and Bralin wanted to shove things up Adam's ass.
But the main goal, much like the double-ended dildo video that Adam and Zack did, I knew I had two completely comfortable guys that would do some different things.
Our goal, get a double self-facial for the finale. Only problem, we were shooting in the massage room and it was just too dang difficult to get upside down for the cumshot.
But having said that, they both nut practically at the same time, and it is pretty hot and a unique way to bust!
title: Adam & Bralin - Wrapped
